refnamediv.refpurpose: Select a single book or all the books to compile from a set

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: When the document root element is a set this parameter can be used to select the book to print, or to publish all the books contained in the set when the value is "all". dblatex can only chunk the set in several books, and is not able to publish several books in a single file.
